message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this fantastic product. I think you'll really love it. Would you be interested in buying it from me for $12,000?
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but $12,000 is a bit too high for me. Would you consider $9,000?
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. I can do better than $9,000, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet in the middle at $11,000?
I understand you need to make a profit, Alice.  How about we settle at $10,000?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $10,000, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,500. I'm getting a bit concerned that if we don't come to an agreement, I might have to sell to someone else.
Alice, I understand your position, but I'm on a tight budget.  $10,500 is my final offer. Let me know if that works for you.

I appreciate your final offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to make one last offer, and I'll meet you at $12,000. If you're not willing to go that high, I'll have to consider selling to someone else.
